title: Rehab Nation: Inside The Secret World of Celebrity Drug Rehabs

For the past ten years, Mark Groubert has covered this beat as an investigative journalist for the LA Weekly (Village Voice Media). He has interviewed the charlatan gurus. He has faked his way into rehab as a phony patient. He has documented the celebrities who have come in and out.""Today in America, itâ€™s harder to open a bagel shop than a residential treatment facility!
